metadata.title: USN-5900-1 -- tar vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that tar incorrectly handled certain files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information or cause a crash.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5900-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  tar-scripts - 1.34+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1.22.04.1 tar - 1.34+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1.22.04.1 No subscription required
